alert.note: Alert for Huron (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 01 at 8:27PM EDT until June 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN RICHLAND...SOUTHERN HURON AND NORTHEASTERN CRAWFORD COUNTIES... At 827 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near New Washington, or 16 miles northeast of Bucyrus, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Shelby, Willard, New London, Plymouth, New Washington, Greenwich, Tiro, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
